title: Knife, 1985-103-236, ca. 1740
markings: On the blade: Crowned S L A M C B E
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Sabre-shaped blade with drop bolster. Plain silver ferrule with horizontal band. Pistol-shaped white porcelain handle, octagonal in section. Floral design in green, blue and brown-red. Silver button cap at the top of the handle.
